Stake F1 team swerves gambling restrictions with dual identityThe Sauber-run Stake Formula One team will race under two names this season to comply with gambling restrictions in some countries. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 20:26:31 GMT QEXB5EILMRILNGVNEONVTDAOE https://www.reuters.com/sports/formula1/stake-f1-team-swerves-gambling-restrictions-with-dual-identity-2024-02-05/Alan Baldwin运动的公式1
EU cautions against trade measures to support solar sectorThe European Union needs to take into account its ambitious targets for solar power deployment before it considers any measures to curb imports of photovoltaic panels, wafers and other components, a senior EU official said on Monday. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 19:20:44 GMT F7MQM6O2CBIDBN37TG6NDZ27BM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-cautions-against-trade-measures-support-solar-sector-2024-02-05/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
US Senate Republicans mull border deal, House counterparts urge rejectionThe lead Republican negotiator in a bipartisan U.S. Senate bill to toughen border security said his caucus should decide by Tuesday whether to open debate on the proposal, while his party's leaders in the House of Representatives urged scrapping the deal. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 19:07:42 GMT H33GNMSI35PL5KIBDCKHAII2WY https://www.reuters.com/world/us/republican-us-senate-border-negotiator-says-party-should-decide-next-move-by-2024-02-05/David Morgan世界美国
China targets margin loans, short selling to help stabilise stocksChina's securities regulator said on Monday that it would tighten scrutiny of margin financing, malicious short selling and seek to ward off risks involving pledged shares. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 16:15:01 GMT X75M2HFBF5IWJFPGEXHYKLWBCE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/china-targets-margin-loans-short- sell-help-stabilise-stocks-2024-02-05/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Rare earths prices seen rebounding in second half of 2024 -analystsRare earth prices have likely bottomed out and are poised to rise later this year on demand from electric vehicles (EVs) and wind power and as dominant producer China is expected to pull back on expanding output quotas, analysts said. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 12:55:35 GMT NN4GVETVGROLNGXO3VPWKVHJXY https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/rare-earths-prices-seen-rebounding-second-half-2024-analysts-2024-02-05/Amy Lv, Mai Nguyen市场商品
Job worries sour mood for Chinese heading home for holidaysChinese workers packed into trains on Monday, heading home for the Lunar New Year holidays with worries about their jobs and a stuttering economy overshadowing the build-up to the long-awaited family reunions. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 12:31:11 GMT TADLTV4HCZKUHETR2JI3BY5BQE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/job-worries-sour-mood-chinese-heading-home-holidays-2024-02-05/Nicoco Chan, Samuel Shen可持续发展可持续财务与报告
Yang Hengjun: What sentence means for China-Australia relationsThe suspended death sentence handed to Australian writer Yang Hengjun in Beijing on Monday is unlikely to derail Australia-China ties but will test the limits of Canberra's push to put relations back on track after years of tensions, analysts say. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 12:24:19 GMT OROPOLR7KFNYVPOZIOK5UWQZ44 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinas-harsh-sentence-australian-writer-tests-limits-rebound-ties-2024-02-05/Laurie Chen世界亚太地区
Exclusive: Chinese brokers restrict cross-border swaps as stocks plunge - sourcesChinese brokerages, including state-owned behemoth China International Capital Corp (CICC), have restricted the amount of cross-border swap transactions domestic investors can undertake, as authorities seek to defend the weak stock market, according to six sources familiar with the matter. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 12:20:06 GMT ZCJNGCKLJFLOXC6K7MX63KCFZA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-brokers-restrict-cross-border-swaps-stocks-plunge-sources-2024-02-05/Summer Zhen世界中国
Yang Hengjun, Australian given suspended death sentence in China, was charismatic blogger, spy novelistAustralian blogger Yang Hengjun, appearing in a Beijing court on Monday to receive a suspended death sentence on espionage charges, looked "very thin, very fragile", his friends in Sydney said. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 12:04:42 GMT LYYTM6K6YJMYVF7MJYYBHE6BS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/yang-hengjun-australian-given-suspended-death-sentence-china-was-charismatic-2024-02-05/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Estee Lauder to cut jobs on skittish China demand; shares surge 19%Estee Lauder plans to cut 3% to 5% of its global workforce as the cosmetics giant expands an effort to shore up margins squeezed by Chinese customers cutting back on higher-priced luxury products, sending its shares up as much as 19%. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 11:49:31 GMT GX77M3XFPBOHTFJN2HZMRNHGX4 https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/estee-lauder-slashes-annual-profit-forecast-cut-jobs-2024-02-05/Ananya Mariam Rajesh商业零售与消费品
Exclusive: AI chip demand forces Huawei to slow smartphone productionSoaring appetite for Huawei's AI chips coupled with manufacturing constraints has forced the Chinese tech giant to prioritise AI and slow production for its premium Mate 60 phones. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:56:10 GMT ESESJTBBJBP7VJGHQMDZFGQR54 https://www.reuters.com/technology/ai-chip-demand-forces-huawei-slow-smartphone-product-sources-2024-02-05/Fanny Potkin, Julie Zhu技术
